title: Real estate showing agent verification
dataVerified: Agent name, photo, license number, brokerage, license status
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Person (often woman) verifies real estate agent credentials before viewing property alone in unfamiliar location. Domain binding verifies state real estate commission or established platform (realtor.com, zillow.com/agents). Prevents fake agent fraud, personal safety risk.
